ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bravura Nerf HIT
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe this is just on magic-based effects? I dunno, at higher levels my druid was able to fire nuke some mobs that were well over 6 levels higher than him at
ygData.messageBody:
Maybe this is just on magic-based effects? I dunno, at higher levels my
druid was able to fire nuke some mobs that were well over 6 levels higher
than him at the time.

Sartori D'Elsiraad<Legion>
50th Bard of Veeshan

>From: "Kevin L. Crawford" <Lyrnia@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@egroups.com
>To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bravura Nerf HIT
>Date: Tue, 18 Apr 2000 15:25:09 -0400
>
>Easy: You can't charm something 6 levels higher than you ;)
>hehe it's an internal caster cap. Nobody can effect stuff more than 5 or 6
>levels above them ;)
>
>Therefore: Level 50 bard attempts charm, mob resists every time, mob is
>over 55
